title: finding a guy
body: anyone knows this guy: *name removed*     he stole my wallet when i played with him in a internet cafe. so plz anyone knows him plz tell me asap coz i want my wallet back.

replies.body: Riot may be able to provide you with more information through the authorities. It may be best to have your local law enforcement contact Riot requesting this information.

you need to be more specific which internet café you guys were what s his rank and other stuff


also there must be security camera in a café and yo can ask for recording and can complain in police if you have you Debit/credit cards in your wallet
